description:
This is part 1 of a many part fantasy epic we have produced on location for hogtied.
Five bondage-loving friends rent a huge villa in Mexico for a weekend of fun, sun, and partying. During dinner they are unaware of a fiendish villain who is watching them. The friends party a little too hard and sleep heavy and late. During the early morning the villain walks in the front door. One at a time our heroines are bound, gagged and grouped together for the start of a wondrous vacation.
title: Cabo: Weekend Nightmare Part 1
